titles.title: Cut REDTAPE Act
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to cut and reduce excess and duplicative tax assessments and paperwork for entrepreneurs.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 9/18/2014--Introduced. Cut REDTAPE Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exempt a new small business, including an incorporated business, from the additional tax imposed for underpayment of estimated income tax, if such business's gross receipts for the calendar year do not exceed $1 million.
